article_title: Obamacare shapes politics in campaigns big and small
article_text: “Pretty much every race, from U.S. Senate to the city council, Obamacare is on people’s minds,” said Republican consultant Aaron Trost. Republicans see it as a winning issue in 2014. Democrats worry that it has become a broader critique of a federal government that many voters distrust, to their party’s disadvantage.

article_metadata.title: Obamacare shapes politics in campaigns big and small | The Kansas City Star

“Pretty much every race, from U.S. Senate to the city council, Obamacare is on people’s minds,” said Republican consultant Aaron Trost.
Democrats worry that it has become a broader critique of a federal government that many voters distrust, to their party’s disadvantage.
Republicans see it as a winning issue in 2014.
